#TITLE And My Name's Booster
#ALBUM Super Mario RPG
#COMPOSER Yoko Shimomura
#ARRANGED Gi Nattak
#TRANSCRIPTION mfvitools

#WAVE 0x20 0x6D ## guitar (CT)
#WAVE 0x21 0x1C ## bass (FF6)
#WAVE 0x22 0x35 ## melodic tom (UNK)
#WAVE 0x23 0xE3 ## soft cymbal (CT)
#WAVE 0x24 0x95 ## clap (TOTR)
#WAVE 0x2A 0x22 ## kick drum (FF6)
#WAVE 0x2B 0xAD ## snare (RD)
#WAVE 0x2C 0x59 ## dirty sax (SMRPG)
#WAVE 0x2D 0x5C ## saxish (SMRPG)
#WAVE 0x2E 0xBC ## clarinet (SMRPG)
#WAVE 0x2F 0xA9 ## electric steel guitar (GH)
